data.title: From Season 3: See release window, storyline, filming, cast and more
data.meta_description: MGM+ (formerly Epix) boasts signature shows like From, The Godfather of Harlem, and The Winter King. Starring Harold Perrineau, From is set in a nightmarish middle American town, trapping residents amidst nocturnal creatures and hidden secrets. Season 3, renewed by creator Jack Bender, faces filming delays due to strikes.
data.text:
Synopsis

MGM+ (formerly Epix) boasts signature shows like From, The Godfather of Harlem, and The Winter King. Starring Harold Perrineau, From is set in a nightmarish middle American town, trapping residents amidst nocturnal creatures and hidden secrets. Season 3, renewed by creator Jack Bender, faces filming delays due to strikes.

MGM+ (formerly Epix) is known for its series like From, The Godfather of Harlem, and The Winter King. Starring Harold Perrineau from Lost, From has a gripping plot set in a nightmarish small town in middle America.

From Season 3: Storyline

Trapped residents battle terrifying creatures from the nearby forest and hidden town secrets. Perrineau plays Sheriff Boyd, stuck in Township with others, surrounded by a hostile forest filled with ferocious monsters.

Fans of From were left stunned by the season two finale, raising questions about the third season's arrival.

From Season 3: Confirmation

Series creator Jack Bender announced FROM's renewal for a third season on July 29, 2023. Signs of pre-production had already emerged as the production union had begun work before the official announcement.

Tabitha's character, who seems to have broken through the supernatural barrier, will play a significant role in helping residents escape.

From Season 3: Filming

However, due to strikes involving writers and actors, filming for the third season has been delayed. Production was initially scheduled from July to December.

Anticipate a delay in the release of the third season. Normally, new seasons debut in the early months of the year, but with the filming setback, it's likely to be pushed to mid to late 2024.

From Season 3: Cast

As for the cast, details remain speculative due to ongoing Hollywood strikes. However, these actors are expected to return:

Harold Perrineau as Sheriff Boyd Stephens

Catalina Sandino Moreno as Tabitha Matthews

Eion Bailey as Jim Matthews

Deborah Grover as Tillie

Angela Moore as Bakta

Kaelen Ohm as Marielle

A.J. Simmons as Randall

Nathan D. Simmons as Elgin

David Alpay as Jade Herrera

Elizabeth Saunders as Donna Raines

Scott McCord as Victor

Ricky He as Kenny Liu

Chloe Van Landschoot as Kristi Miller

Pegah Ghafoori as Fatima Hassan

Corteon Moore as Ellis Stevens

Hannah Cheramy as Julie Matthews

Simon Webster as Ethan Matthews

Avery Konrad as Sara Myers

Elizabeth Moy as Tian-Chen Liu

FAQs

When was From season 3 officially renewed?

On July 29, 2023, series creator and showrunner Jack Bender announced the renewal of From for its third season, confirming its return to MGM+.

What is the expected release date for From season 3?

Due to production delays caused by strikes, From season 3 is likely to premiere in mid to late 2024, deviating from its usual early-year schedule.
